Use this file to remove IMOs that are no longer in service. Please specify source that IMO has been discontinued.
tags.ignore:gone: Not seen on AIS for a long time

tags.other:unknown-flag: Ships with a history of not being registered with a flag state, within the last 5 years
tags.transfers:bunkering-mediterranean: Ships that were engaged in bunkering with other sketchy ships in the Mediterranean
